name: meat and bone meal to generic market for protein feed | energy feed, gross | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17950/documentation

This activity is a linking activity, i.e. it connects meat and bone meal with the generic market for protein feed. Meat and bone meal is used partially as a feed for animals, thus traded on generic feed market with other protein - containing products.

The activity starts with the reception of meat and bone meal.

Valid for all linking activities: The activity models the part of meat and bone meal which contributes to the generic market for protein feed.
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/108:Manufacture of prepared animal feeds/1080:Manufacture of prepared animal feeds

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data is primarily sourced from literature and statistics.

exchanges.description:
Calculated based on literature value for fish oil, 17.7 MJ/kg DM as reported in Feedipedia. 

References: 

Feedipedia, Animal feed resources information system: Accessed at https://www.feedipedia.org/node/222 on13/04/2018.
